name: Wage Worker (pralba)
description:
Energy is Life, Jumping costs Energy, Abilities cost Energy.

You're a Robot Single Mother trying to provide for your Family. You must go out there and exhaust yourself trying to make enough money to pay the rent and bring food to the table.

Created in 48 Hours for the First Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam: Paulo Ricardo Oliveira Alba - Art Francisco Vaghetti Luchese - Programming Tomaz Corral Moreira - Game Design
